DOC.brief_summary: Biological Standardization of Cupressus arizonica Allergen Extract.
DOC.brief_title: Biological Standarization of Cupressus Arizonica Allergen Extract to Determine the Biological Activity in Histamine Equivalent Units (HEP)
DOC.detailed_description: This is an open, unblinded and non-randomized biological assay. The study design is a slight modification of the recommendations proposed by the Nordic Guidelines.
DOC.criteria: Subject has provided written informed consent, appropriately signed and dated by subject. Subject can be male or female of any race and ethinic group. A positive test for specific IgE to Cupressus arizonica.
